metadata.title: CVE-2024-32608

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

metadata.description: HDF5 library through 1.14.3 has memory corruption in H5A__close resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer and causing denial of service or potential code execution.
